definition[0]: to discuss or think about something carefully
example[0]: Management need to explore ways of improving office security.

definition[1]: to travel around an area in order to find out about it
example[2]: Venice is a wonderful city to explore.
definition[2]: to feel something with your hand or another part of your body to find out what it is like
example[3]: Gingerly she explored the bump on her head with her fingers.
